author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing a process for personnel to report suspicious activity or potential security incidents. It includes defining clear reporting channels, providing training on how to recognize and report suspicious behavior, and ensuring that all reports are documented and acted upon appropriately. This is crucial for early detection and response to security threats.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.

title: Personnel Reporting of Suspicious Activity

references.name: NIST SP 800-137: Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM)
MITRE ATT&CK: Discovery Tactics and Detection Strategies
CISA Zero Trust Architecture - Monitoring and Analytics
